BodyName: Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the bicycle safety course required for bicycle operators and suspension and revocation of a license issued to third-party food delivery services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Third-party delivery workers and powered bicycle safety.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the misdemeanor criminal penalties for general vendors and mobile food vendors
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Hearing Held by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Repealing the misdemeanor criminal penalties for general vendors and mobile food vendors.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to protections for contracted delivery workers

Items.MatterName: Minimum payments to grocery delivery workers.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Veto and disapproval of Introductory Number 47-B, A Local Law to amend the Administrative Code of the City of New York, in relation to repealing the misdemeanor criminal penalties for general vendors and mobile food vendors.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto and disapproval of Introductory Number 47-B.
